name: The Golden Temple loops vol 7 "Tension"
description:
Taavi Varm (2020) | 1920x1080 mp4, no audio, seamless loop , 60 sec | www.varmstudio.com

This piece is part of videos created for the ballet "The Golden Tempel" inspired by a novel of Yukio Mishima and choreography by Teet Kask. Ballet premiered in December 2020 in Estonian National Opera and was nominated for best ballet @ Estonian Theatre Awards.
